name: 12-35 Inch Extendable Inspection Mirror, 360-Degree Rotation Inspection Mirror Telescoping, Telescoping Mirror for Mechanic Checking Vehicle and Extra Viewing
short_description: [Retractable handle] The retractable design allows you to adjust the length from 12 inches to 35 inches, you can adjust the length of the hand pole according to your needs. No more struggling to see hidden spaces!

[360 - Degree Rotation for Comprehensive Views] Our rectangular inspection mirror offers a full 360 - degree rotation. This means you can effortlessly see everything from all angles, eliminating blind spots and ensuring a thorough inspection every time.

[Durable and Sturdy Construction] Made from premium materials, the handle is strong and non - slip, ensuring a secure grip even in wet or oily conditions. The mirror is shatter - resistant, standing up to the rigors of regular use in tough work environments.

[Portable and Space - Saving] When not in use, simply retract the mirror. It becomes compact and lightweight, fitting neatly into your toolbox or backpack. You can have it with you wherever you go, ready for any inspection task that comes your way.

[Versatile Application] Suitable for a variety of inspections, including automotive maintenance, home appliance repair, plumbing checks, and even checking for pests in hidden corners. It's an essential tool for both professionals and homeowners.
